skillsDescription: Responsibilities would include,  however not be limited to: To gain an understanding of the product offering and its reference architecture Working with the Solution Architecture,  Project Management Office,  Infrastructure and Product Marketing team to create indicative costing for Delivery projects Working closely with data analysis teams to produce reports and statistical analysis Produce delivery analysis presentations,  outlining overview,  scope,  assumptions,  costs,  plan,  etc.  Prepare reports and agendas for internal meetings with senior management To be familiar with current and pipeline projects You: Will have strong Excel and PowerPoint skills A passion for analysis and project analytics Ideally come from a business/technology/economics driven degree or technology background.  Have 2-3 years’ commercial experience My client have begun interviewing already,  so please do not hesitate to apply.
companyDescription: An online gaming technology supplier and operator
description: My client,  a leading online gaming company,  are looking for a junior data analyst to join their team.  Working as an Analyst within the Interactive and Betting Delivery organisation as part of Solution Architecture team.
